page.title: 09JUDO AND BROWNIES.
page.content: Members of the Judo club meet at Bicton every week. If you are 6 years old, you csn join for an annual subscription of Â£2 and a further 50p. a session. At 8 years old, you can apply for a licence from the British Judo Association. Each Autumn there is a championship competition at the club and all the members take part. This year, the members have spent the money they raised at social functions on new judo mats for the club. Brownies meet every week at the Scout Hut in Rad Valley Gardens. They work for badges and enjoy playing games. Any girl between 7 and 11 years of age can join. The Brownie Promise: "I promise I will do my best To do my duty to God, And help other people".
